attributes.action: Ask the EU to invite Ukraine to be a member.
attributes.additional_details: Ukraine is part of Europe has has been on the path to join the EU for some years. In it’s hour of need, becoming an EU member may assist the country and people in it’s current plight and help secure it’s future sovereignty and economic success.
attributes.background: The UK Gov should use it’s leverage with the EU to speed up the process (ie immediate!) of Ukraine joining the EU.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about accepting new members are a matter for the EU, not the UK Government or Parliament.
